Text: has anyone else been able to download this? i haven't gotten one bit

Thanks for making these.  Now I can watch the show with my family.

I don't see a S03E06 release... was this another rare episode with nothing to censor?

Also thanks for just dropping the Theon scene... not just because of nudity, but also because his plot is getting tedious.  Don't be afraid to cut a pornographic scene entirely when it adds nothing to the show, or if the information in it gets repeated in the same or another episode.

sailerfan - Episode 6 have almost no nudity scene except for one last part in the End.

LifeTheHound - Thanks again for this awesome work, can't wait for episode 8 :D
